homepage.title: HEAR-UI
homepage.subtitle: AI-Assisted Decision Support for Cochlear Implants
homepage.description: A web application that visualizes AI-powered predictions to support clinicians in assessing cochlear implant suitability and expected outcomes.
homepage.search_patients_text: Quickly find patients by ID, name or other criteria to review their data.
homepage.search_patients_image_alt: Illustration representing searching through patient records.
homepage.create_patient_text: Register a new patient and enter their clinical information for analysis.
homepage.create_patient_image_alt: Illustration representing adding a new patient.
homepage.prediction_text: Explore risk scores, model outputs and performance for your patients.
homepage.prediction_image_alt: Illustration representing risk prediction and analytics.
homepage.welcome_text: Welcome to Hear-UI, a project for predicting hearing loss.

error.name: Name needs to be at least 2 characters.
